en: the round object that moves around the earth
ex: The moon is bright on Mid-Autumn night.

en: a group of parents and children

ex: Mid-Autumn Festival is a traditional holiday.

en: to do something special because of a happy event
a round pastry eaten during Mid-Autumn Festival

ex: There is a legend about Hou Yi and Chang’e.

en: a person skilled with a bow
ex: Hou Yi was a great archer.
Chang’e became immortal after drinking the elixir.

en: a large house where a king or queen lives
ex: She flew to the Moon Palace.

en: a time when people come together again
ex: The festival is a time for family reunion.

en: a custom passed down through time
ex: Mid-Autumn Festival is a Chinese tradition.
